gui

Class OutOfBandHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.OutOfBandHandler

  • public class OutOfBandHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a simple handler to parse responses which contain an \ tag. The Bot returns an xml response for Out of Band calls and this handler is designed to parse those commands and use a text file listing paths to various programs on the current machine in order to try and handle those requests. New paths can be added by editing the paths.txt file located in the \/config/ folder
    Author:
    Dave
